cnd17:2.3: Pathamenapi jhanena jhayi, dutiyenapi jhanena jhayi, tatiyenapi jhanena jhayi, catutthenapi jhanena jhayi, savitakkasavicarenapi jhanena jhayi, avitakkavicaramattenapi jhanena jhayi, avitakkaavicarenapi jhanena jhayi, sappitikenapi jhanena jhayi, nippitikenapi jhanena jhayi, satasahagatenapi jhanena jhayi, upekkhasahagatenapi jhanena jhayi, sunnatenapi jhanena jhayi, animittenapi jhanena jhayi, appanihitenapi jhanena jhayi, lokiyenapi jhanena jhayi, lokuttarenapi jhanena jhayi jhanarato ekattamanuyutto sadatthagarukoti—
cnd17:2.5: Virajanti rago rajo, doso rajo, moho rajo, kodho rajo, upanaho rajo …pe… sabbakusalabhisankhara raja.
cnd17:2.6: Te raja buddhassa bhagavato pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
cnd17:2.7: Tasma buddho arajo virajo nirajo rajapagato rajavippahino rajavippayutto sabbarajavitivatto.
cnd17:3.1: Rago rajo na ca pana renu vuccati,
cnd17:4.1: Doso rajo na ca pana renu vuccati,
cnd17:5.1: Moho rajo na ca pana renu vuccati,
cnd17:8.2: Atha va bhagava sabbossukkapatippassaddhatta asino vutthavaso cinnacarano …pe… jatimaranasamsaro natthi tassa punabbhavoti.
cnd17:10.1: Katakiccam anasavanti buddhassa bhagavato kiccakiccam karaniyakaraniyam pahinam ucchinnamulam talavatthukatam anabhavankatam ayatim anuppadadhammam.
cnd17:12.4: Te asava buddhassa bhagavato pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
cnd17:13.1: Paragum sabbadhammananti bhagava sabbadhammanam abhinnaparagu parinnaparagu pahanaparagu bhavanaparagu sacchikiriyaparagu samapattiparagu.
cnd17:13.2: Abhinnaparagu sabbadhammanam, parinnaparagu sabbadukkhanam, pahanaparagu sabbakilesanam, bhavanaparagu catunnam magganam, sacchikiriyaparagu nirodhassa, samapattiparagu sabbasamapattinam.
cnd17:13.7: So paragato parappatto antagato antappatto kotigato kotippatto pariyantagato pariyantappatto vosanagato vosanappatto tanagato tanappatto lenagato lenappatto saranagato saranappatto abhayagato abhayappatto accutagato accutappatto amatagato amatappatto nibbanagato nibbanappatto.
cnd17:13.8: So vuttavaso cinnacarano …pe… jatimaranasamsaro natthi tassa punabbhavoti—
cnd17:14.1: Atthi panhena agamanti panhena atthiko agatomhi, panham pucchitukamo agatomhi, panham sotukamo agatomhiti, evampi atthi panhena agamam.
cnd17:14.2: Atha va panhatthikanam panham pucchitukamanam panham sotukamanam agamanam abhikkamanam upasankamanam payirupasanam atthiti, evampi atthi panhena agamam.
cnd17:14.3: Atha va panhagamo tuyham atthi, tvampi pahu tvamasi alamatto maya pucchitam kathetum visajjetum, vahassetam bharanti, evampi atthi panhena agamam.
cnd17:15.2: Arahattavimokkham pabruhi acikkhahi desehi pannapehi patthapehi vivarahi vibhajahi uttanikarohi pakasehiti—
cnd17:16.1: Avijjaya pabhedananti avijjaya bhedanam pabhedanam pahanam vupasamam patinissaggam patippassaddham amatam nibbananti—
cnd17:19.2: Chandoti yo kamesu kamacchando kamarago kamanandi kamatanha kamasineho kamapipasa kamaparilaho kamamuccha kamajjhosanam kamogho kamayogo kamupadanam kamacchandanivaranam.
cnd17:19.3: Pahanam kamacchandananti kamacchandanam pahanam vupasamam patinissaggam patippassaddhim amatam nibbananti—
cnd17:20.2: Domanassati yam cetasikam asatam cetasikam dukkham cetosamphassajam asatam dukkham vedayitam, cetosamphassaja asata dukkha vedana.
cnd17:20.3: Domanassana cubhayanti kamacchandassa ca domanassassa ca ubhinnam pahanam vupasamam patinissaggam patippassaddhim amatam nibbananti—
cnd17:21.2: Thinanti ya cittassa akalyata akammannata oliyana salliyana lina liyana liyitattam thinam thiyana thiyitattam cittassa.
cnd17:21.3: Panudananti thinassa ca panudanam pahanam vupasamam patinissaggam patippassaddhim amatam nibbananti—
cnd17:22.2: Kukkuccanti hatthakukkuccampi kukkuccam, padakukkuccampi kukkuccam, hatthapadakukkuccampi kukkuccam.
cnd17:22.5: Yam evarupam kukkuccam kukkuccayana kukkuccayitattam cetaso vippatisaro manovilekho, idam vuccati kukkuccam.
cnd17:22.6: Api ca dvihi karanehi uppajjati kukkuccam cetaso vippatisaro manovilekho—
cnd17:22.8: Katham katatta ca akatatta ca uppajjati kukkuccam cetaso vippatisaro manovilekho?
cnd17:22.9: “Katam me kayaduccaritam, akatam me kayasucaritan”ti uppajjati kukkuccam cetaso vippatisaro manovilekho.
cnd17:22.12: “kato me panatipato, akata me panatipata veramani”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.13: “katam me adinnadanam, akata me adinnadana veramani”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.14: “kato me kamesumicchacaro, akata me kamesumicchacara veramani”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.15: “kato me musavado, akata me musavada veramani”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.16: “kata me pisuna vaca, akata me pisunaya vacaya veramani”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.17: “kata me pharusa vaca, akata me pharusaya vacaya veramani”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.18: “kato me samphappalapo, akata me samphappalapa veramani”ti …pe…
cnd17:22.21: “kata me micchaditthi, akata me sammaditthi”ti, uppajjati kukkuccam cetaso vippatisaro manovilekho.
cnd17:22.22: Evam katatta ca akatatta ca uppajjati kukkuccam cetaso vippatisaro manovilekho.
cnd17:23.1: Atha va “silesumhi aparipurakari”ti uppajjati kukkuccam cetaso vippatisaro manovilekho;
cnd17:23.6: “abhavita me cattaro satipatthanati, cattaro sammappadhanati cattaro iddhipadati, pancindriyaniti, panca balaniti, satta bojjhangati, ariyo atthangiko maggo”ti …
cnd17:23.7: “dukkham me aparinnatam, samudayo me appahino, maggo me abhavito, nirodho me asacchikato”ti uppajjati kukkuccam cetaso vippatisaro manovilekho.
cnd17:24.1: Kukkuccanam nivarananti kukkuccanam avaranam nivaranam pahanam upasamam vupasamam patinissaggam patippassaddhim amatam nibbananti—
cnd17:27.2: Upekkhati ya catutthe jhane upekkha upekkhana ajjhupekkhana cittasamata cittappassaddhata majjhattata cittassa.
cnd17:27.3: Satiti ya catutthe jhane upekkham arabbha sati anussati …pe… sammasati.
cnd17:27.4: Upekkhasatisamsuddhanti catutthe jhane upekkha ca sati ca suddha honti visuddha samsuddha parisuddha pariyodata anangana vigatupakkilesa mudubhuta kammaniya thita anenjappattati—
cnd17:28.2: So adito hoti, purato hoti, pubbangamo hoti annavimokkhassati, evampi dhammatakkapurejavam.
cnd17:28.4: Sa adito hoti, purato hoti, pubbangamo hoti annavimokkhassati, evampi dhammatakkapurejavam.
cnd17:28.5: Atha va dhammatakko vuccati catunnam magganam pubbabhagavipassana.
cnd17:28.6: Sa adito hoti, purato hoti, pubbangamo hoti annavimokkhassati—
cnd17:29.2: Arahattavimokkham pabrumi acikkhami desemi pannapemi patthapemi vivarami vibhajami uttanikaromi pakasemiti—
cnd17:30.3: Pabhedananti avijjaya pabhedanam pahanam vupasamam patinissaggam patippassaddhim amatam nibbananti—
cnd17:33.1: Kimsu samyojano lokoti lokassa samyojanam lagganam bandhanam upakkileso.
cnd17:33.2: Kena loko yutto payutto ayutto samayutto laggo laggito palibuddhoti—
cnd17:34.1: Kimsu tassa vicarananti kimsu tassa caranam vicaranam pativicaranam.
cnd17:34.4: Kissassa vippahanena nibbanam iti vuccatiti kissassa vippahanena vupasamena patinissaggena patippassaddhiya nibbanam iti vuccati pavuccati kathiyati bhaniyati dipiyati vohariyatiti—
cnd17:37.2: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam, ayam vuccati nandi.
cnd17:37.3: Ya nandi lokassa samyojanam lagganam bandhanam upakkileso, imaya nandiya loko yutto payutto ayutto samayutto laggo laggito palibuddhoti—
cnd17:38.3: kamavitakko, byapadavitakko, vihimsavitakko, nativitakko janapadavitakko, amaravitakko, paranudayatapatisamyutto vitakko, labhasakkarasilokapatisamyutto vitakko, anavannattipatisamyutto vitakko.
cnd17:38.5: Ime nava vitakka lokassa carana vicarana pativicarana.
cnd17:38.6: Imehi navahi vitakkehi loko carati vicarati pativicaratiti—
cnd17:39.3: Tanhaya vippahanena nibbanam iti vuccatiti tanhaya vippahanena vupasamena patinissaggena patippassaddhiya nibbanam iti vuccati pavuccati kathiyati bhaniyati dipiyati vohariyatiti—
cnd17:42.1: Katham satassa caratoti katham satassa sampajanassa carato viharato iriyato vattayato palayato yapayato yapayatoti—
cnd17:43.1: Vinnanam uparujjhatiti vinnanam nirujjhati vupasammati attham gacchati patippassambhatiti—
cnd17:44.1: Bhagavantam putthumagamati buddham bhagavantam putthum pucchitum yacitum ajjhesitum pasadetum agamha agatamha upagatamha sampattamha, “taya saddhim samagatamha”ti—
cnd17:45.2: Tanti tuyham vacanam byappatham desanam anusasanam anusittham sunoma ugganhama dharema upadharema upalakkhemati—
cnd17:48.1: Ajjhattanca bahiddha ca vedanam nabhinandatoti ajjhattam vedanasu vedananupassi viharanto vedanam nabhinandati nabhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanam abhivadanam ajjhosanam gaham paramasam abhinivesam pajahati vinodeti byantikaroti anabhavam gameti;
cnd17:48.2: bahiddha vedanasu vedananupassi viharanto vedanam nabhinandati nabhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanam abhivadanam ajjhosanam gaham paramasam abhinivesam pajahati vinodeti byantikaroti anabhavam gameti;
cnd17:48.3: ajjhattabahiddha vedanasu vedananupassi viharanto vedanam nabhinandati nabhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanam abhivadanam ajjhosanam gaham paramasam abhinivesam pajahati vinodeti byantikaroti anabhavam gameti.
cnd17:49.1: Ajjhattam samudayadhammanupassi vedanasu vedananupassi viharanto vedanam nabhinandati nabhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanam abhivadanam ajjhosanam gaham paramasam abhinivesam pajahati vinodeti byantikaroti anabhavam gameti;
cnd17:49.4: bahiddha samudayadhammanupassi vedanasu vedananupassi viharanto vedanam nabhinandati nabhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanam abhivadanam ajjhosanam gaham paramasam abhinivesam pajahati vinodeti byantikaroti anabhavam gameti;
cnd17:49.9: ajjhattabahiddha samudayavayadhammanupassi vedanasu vedananupassi viharanto vedanam nabhinandati nabhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanam abhivadanam ajjhosanam gaham paramasam abhinivesam pajahati vinodeti byantikaroti anabhavam gameti.
cnd17:49.10: Imehi dvadasahi akarehi vedanasu vedananupassi viharanto …pe…
cnd17:50.1: Atha va vedanam aniccato passanto vedanam nabhinandati nabhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanam abhivadanam ajjhosanam gaham paramasam abhinivesam pajahati vinodeti byantikaroti anabhavam gameti.
cnd17:50.2: Vedanam dukkhato rogato gandato sallato aghato abadhato …pe…
cnd17:50.3: nissaranato passanto vedanam nabhinandati nabhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanam abhivadanam ajjhosanam gaham paramasam abhinivesam pajahati vinodeti byantikaroti anabhavam gameti.
cnd17:50.4: Imehi cattalisaya akarehi vedanasu vedananupassi viharanto vedanam nabhinandati nabhivadati na ajjhoseti, abhinandanam abhivadanam ajjhosanam gaham paramasam abhinivesam pajahati vinodeti byantikaroti anabhavam gametiti—
cnd17:51.1: Evam satassa caratoti evam satassa sampajanassa carato viharato iriyato vattayato palayato yapayato yapayatoti—
cnd17:52.1: Vinnanam uparujjhatiti punnabhisankharasahagatam vinnanam apunnabhisankharasahagatam vinnanam anenjabhisankharasahagatam vinnanam nirujjhati vupasammati attham gacchati patippassambhatiti—
